segments.text: What are you doing ? Checking the " to do " list for the wedding ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yep . There's still so much to do !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So let's start by checking off what we've already done .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you reconfirm the plane reservations for all the Taiwanese guests ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not yet , I was busy getting that videographer who films stuff for the Net .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cool ! I can't believe he agreed to go all the way to Dallas with us !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey ! We're paying for his ticket !
segments.speaker: S1
